subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 29 points and Dwyane Wade had 25 as Miami held off Oklahoma City in Game 3 of the N.B.A. finals to take a 2-1 series lead.
snippet: LeBron James scored 29 points and Dwyane Wade had 25 as Miami held off Oklahoma City in Game 3 of the N.B.A. finals to take a 2-1 series lead.
